1370: Bobone moved to Den Hof.C.1 after marriage.
Got married to Gloria at age 24 in 1370.
Had a son with Gloria, Abelkijn, at age 24.
1373: Had a daughter with Gloria, Machtilden, at age 27.
1374: Had a daughter with Gloria, Trame, at age 28.
1375: Lost daughter Machtilden when Machtilden was 3 years old.
1377: Had a daughter with Gloria, Jacomin, at age 31.
1381: Lost his wife Gloria while she was giving birth to Reinardus in 1381.
1390: Lost son Reinardus when Reinardus was 10 years old.
